people are running late and just getting there .

output.sentences: People came from far away to hear the political candidates give their speeches.
Some audience members misjudged their timing and arrived late.
Most attendees enjoyed the event and were glad they had come.
After a while, the speaker of the day -- the town mayor -- arrived and gave a stirring speech.
All in all, it was a proud day for the town.
